Research Focus: Investigation of tendon and intramuscular connective tissue adaptation to mechanical loading, and the pathogenesis behind overuse tendon injury. Further, the aging-related adaptation of skeletal muscle and connective tissue to exercise and disuse.

About ISMC

The ISMC is located in Copenhagen city, Denmark, and was established at the Department of Rheumatology at Bispebjerg Hospital in conjunction with the establishment of a professorship in Sports Medicine at the University of Copenhagen in 1997.

Visit us at
